Text:
Hey thanks a lot for all the uploads XaltedSmoke!

Really appreciated.

By the way, can you throw them up asap for the last 5 episodes :) I can barely wait for your uploads haha - the final week is getting exciting.

So sad to see its coming to the end.
Who is everyone's guess for the winner?

The episodes will be up as soon as I have them.
Sometimes its fairly early in the morning, and sometimes its that evening.  I usually upload them within 5 mins of finishing the download myself.  Quick skim to check that its complete, then up it goes!

Hopefully this won't be a one-off and there will be another season.  From what I hear unfortunately the ratings haven't been so hot.  Shame.

Thanks so much for doing these.  Love the show but I miss them pretty regularly - just the wrong time for a couple of days each week, so really appreciate you making them available.

There will be a second season I hear - they're planning on changing the format somehow to help with the ratings.

Thanx alot .... desperately waiting for episode 63 .... plsssss upload 
Greetings from Athens -Greece :)
It will be ready to seed in about 15 mins... YAY
